meanings: [명사] opposition (between), conflict, confrontation; (오랫동안 지속되어 온) antagonism (to/toward/between), (formal) polarity (between), be up (against), [동사] be pitted (against), be in conflict (with), be in confrontation (with)
the antagonism of one race against another

vlive.korean: [과연 이 팽팽한 의견 대립의 결과는?] 과연 정답은? [How will this controversy end?] What will be the answer? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.86
vlive.english: [How will this controversy end?] What will be the answer?

vlive.korean: 감정적으로 대립해요. We fight emotionally. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
그 당시의 대립된 시각? Their opposing perspectives? 듣기 View video BTS : RM Live! 🤢
[의견 대립] 이거 필요 없어. [Arguing] We don't need this. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7의 하드캐리 8화 (GOT7's Hard Carry ep.8)
왜 이렇게 두 분이 대립을 하는 겁니까? How come you two are in a conflict? 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 신하균 X 도경수 X 김동영 X 이용승 감독 <7호실> 무비토크 라이브 ' MovieTalk LIVE'
vlive.english: How come you two are in a conflict?

examples.korean: She wanted to avoid another confrontation with her father. 발음듣기 그녀는 아버지와 또 다시 대립하는 것은 피하고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She wanted to avoid another confrontation with her father. 발음

examples.korean: We were in opposing camps. 발음듣기 우리는 서로 대립되는 진영에 속해 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were in opposing camps. 발음

examples.korean: oppositional groups / tactics 발음듣기 서로 경쟁[대립]적인 단체들/상반되는 전략들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
technology as opposed to pure science subjects 발음듣기 순수 과학 분야들과 대립되는 기술 과학 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: technology as opposed to pure science subjects 발음

examples.korean: A row has broken out over education. 발음듣기 교육 문제를 두고 심각한 의견 대립이 발생했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A row has broken out over education. 발음
